author: cnbc.com
title: OneDigital Health and Benefits Acquires The Reaves Agency
text:
Acquisition of Innovative Employee Benefits Firm Strengthens Regional Presence
ATLANTA--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- OneDigital Health and Benefits , the nation’s largest employee benefits-only company, has acquired The Reaves Agency, LLC, in Richardson, Texas. Going forward, The Reaves Agency will assume the name the OneDigital Dallas and continue to provide clients with forward-thinking employee benefits consulting services, compliance resources, HR consulting and technology, administration and health and wellness strategy.
Managing Principals Jonathan Reaves and Brad McEowen, and team of 17 advisors have focused on building and project managing the right benefits and human capital initiatives allowing them to become a leader in the region.
“The impressive team that Jonathan and Brad have built, combined with OneDigital’s suite of employee benefits tools and resources is a powerful combination that will serve their existing client base and prospects looking for improved solutions to today’s employee benefits challenges,” says OneDigital EVP, Mergers & Acquisitions Adam Pannell.
“We were completely blown away by the leadership team. OneDigital has the best people and culture in our industry,” says Jonathan Reaves, managing principal at OneDigital Dallas. “We wanted to plug into OneDigital’s momentum and benefit from the direction the company is headed. Aligning with OneDigital will help us provide the resources and expertise our clients need.”
About OneDigital Health and Benefits
OneDigital Health and Benefits , the nation’s largest company focused exclusively on employee benefits, offers employers a sophisticated combination of strategic advisory services, analytics, compliance support, human resources capital management tools and comprehensive insurance offerings. Headquartered in Atlanta, OneDigital has more than 1,200 employees throughout the country, serves 35,000 companies and manages nearly $4.5 billion in premiums. Formerly known as Digital Insurance and Digital Benefit Advisors, the company has been named to the Inc. 5000 List of America’s fastest-growing companies since the honor’s inception in 2007.
About The Reaves Agency, LLC
The Reaves Agency acts as the single source adviser and concierge for the design, pricing, communication, implementation and administration of employee benefits, compliance, HR consulting and HR technology. Their team of industry experts align clients with the products, processes and people to best meet their needs using a full range of competitive choices available. The Reaves Agency operates exclusively in the benefits area, delivering the highest level of focused solutions and professional service.
